root.name: Damage Inc.: Pacific Squadron WWII
root.description: OverviewIn Damage Inc.: Pacific Squadron WWII you can fly in over 30 aircrafts which can be controlled with a Fight Stick.System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Windows XP (SP2)Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon X2 4000+Memory:1 GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA GeForce 7800 or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro, 256MB, Shader Model 3.0+ Graphics CardDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:4 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX 9.0c-compatible Sound CardOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connectionRecommended:OS:Windows XP (SP2)Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon X2 4000+Memory: 2 GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA GeForce 7800 or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro, 256MB, Shader Model 3.0+ Graphics CardDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:4 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX 9.0c-compatible Sound CardOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

similar_games.game: Blazing Angels 2: Secret Missions of WWII
